about_the_game:
IslaNode: Rescue Signal takes players on a survival adventure like no other, set on a deserted island with nothing but natural resources and your wits. Stranded alone, you’ll need to explore, gather materials, and use a unique node-based crafting system to transform basic elements into survival tools. The ultimate goal? Construct a towering lighthouse to signal for help and secure your escape. Each resource you gather, from wood to stone, plays a crucial role in building a sturdy, weather-resistant tower as you face the challenges of the island environment. With vibrant, cartoony visuals and an intuitive crafting interface, IslaNode combines the thrill of survival with the satisfaction of creative construction.
